meta_description: The Kennedy Museum of Art is a vibrant cultural hub that brings art, education, and inspiration to our community.
hours_text:
## Experience OHIO for Yourself

It's easy to see the beauty of our campus in photos across our website, but nothing compares to how it feels to breathe in the fresh air of fall and see the colorful leaves tumble across the bricks while crossing College Green, or taking in a spring sunset while enjoying the magic of the [Cherry Blossom trees](https://www.ohio.edu/cherry-blossoms) along the Hocking River. What are you waiting for? There are so many experiences waiting for you in [Athens](https://www.ohio.edu/athens-community) — register for the campus visit that works best for you to get started!

  * ##  Special Visit Programs 

* * *

Special visit programs offer unique opportunities to get a sneak peek into life at OHIO. If you're a prospective first-year or transfer student or a high-achieving high school senior, you'll want to check out these options! Can't make it to campus? No problem — join us in a city near you to learn about life as a Bobcat. Check back often, because we add new options regularly!

[Special Visit Programs](/admissions/visit/special-visit-programs-overview)

  * ##  Daily Campus Visits 

* * *

Daily campus visits offer the flexibility to explore OHIO on the date that works best for you. You can also personalize your visit by scheduling a time to meet with a representative from an academic college while you're on campus.

[Sign Up for a Daily Visit](https://enroll.ohio.edu/portal/event_dailyvisits_fr)

  * ##  Visit Options for Transfer Students 

* *...
admission_text:
## Make change for a better future.  
Let's get started.

At Ohio University, our faculty never settle, and neither should you. OHIO strives to be the best student-centered, transformative learning community in America, where students move their ideas into action in more than 250 different academic programs. Here, you can create the change you seek and experience undeniable outcomes. [Apply to Ohio University today](/admissions/apply "Apply")

## Get Your Application Started

  * [ Freshman You are a freshman if you are in high school OR you have graduated but haven’t been enrolled at a college or university since completing high school.  ](/admissions/freshman)
  * [ Transfer You are a transfer student if you have completed 9 semester hours or more (12 quarter hours) at another institution after you graduated from high school. ](/admissions/transfer)
  * [ International You are an international student if you have or will have a temporary visa and do not have U.S. citizenship or legal permanent resident status (a "green card"). ](/admissions/international)
  * [ Online You are an online student if you plan to work toward an associate's or bachelor's degree taking only online classes through our eCampus. ](https://www.ohio.edu/admissions/online)

## Financial Aid Webinar - Financial Aid Overview

accessibility_text:
## Accessibility Statement

Kennedy Museum of Art is committed to accessibility, diversity, and inclusion by ensuring equal opportunity and access for all visitors.

It is the [policy of Ohio University that there shall be no discrimination](/policy/40-001 "40.001") against any individual in educational opportunities because of race, color, religion, age, ethnicity, national origin, national ancestry, sex, pregnancy, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, military service or veteran status, mental or physical disability, or genetic information.

“Inclusion and accessibility begin with providing transparent information about our institution as we continue to make improvements and work toward our aspirations of being an inclusive university.” For information and resources about accessibility at Ohio University, contact the [Office for University Accessibility](/accessibility "Accessibility Services").

## Getting to the Museum

The museum is located on The Ridges (100 Ridges Circle). [View the detailed map. [PDF]](/sites/default/files/sites/museum/files/2016KennedyWalkingMap.pdf)

### Accessible Parking and Entrance

There are three accessible parking spaces located within lot 200 across the street from the museum entrance. The museum has an accessible entrance on the West side of the building that is equipped with a power assist door and an interior lift. All public areas of the museum are wheelchair accessible. Persons using mobility devices like motorized...

## Support the Kennedy Museum of Art

The Kennedy Museum of Art is a vibrant cultural hub that brings art, education, and inspiration to our community. Your support helps us preserve and showcase extraordinary collections, offer engaging exhibitions, and provide educational opportunities for all ages.

Join us in making art accessible to everyone. Your contribution makes a difference!

[Support the Kennedy Museum of Art](https://www.givecampus.com/campaigns/47567/donations/new?designation=friendsofthekennedymuseumsp)
